thread.title: Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy

title: Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy
text:
Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy "Dear Greg, You can stay a Cowboy. We'll see you Thanksgiving. Love, The Panthers" Post to Facebook Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy "Dear Greg, You can stay a Cowboy. We'll see you Thanksgiving. Love, The Panthers"  //on.wfmy.com/1LkX0Xy   Join the Conversation To   Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy WFMY News 2 9:11 p.m. EDT October 8, 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy WFMY News 2 Sports 
Like many sports journalists, WFMY News 2 Sports Anchor Liz Crawford reported on Greg Hardy's return to the football field. The former Carolina Panther will make his debut as a Dallas Cowboy this Sunday. 
You might expect an apology or ounce of humility from Hardy but when asked many questions from the media, Hardy's responses left a bad taste in many mouths, including Liz Crawford. 
Liz ended her segment with, "Dear Greg, You can stay a Cowboy. We'll see you Thanksgiving. Love, The Panthers" Read or Share this story: http://on.wfmy.com/1LkX0Xy TOP VIDEOS
